sentences.en: A sharp overhang of rock gave them cover.
sentences.cn: 一块凸出来的尖利岩石成了他们的避身之所。

sentences.en: By default, characters are repositioned to avoid any overhang.
sentences.cn: 默认情况下, 将重新定位字符以避免任何延伸.

sentences.en: He measured the amount of overhang.
sentences.cn: 他量了量后面超出的部分.

sentences.en: Let the pastry overhang the rim and brush between the layers with the melted butter.
sentences.cn: 用油酥面皮盖住边缘，每层之间抹些熔化的黄油。

sentences.en: Overhang from the spindle to the pump to see, for clockwise rotation.
sentences.cn: 从主光轴外伸端向泵看, 为顺时针扭转.

sentences.en: Part of the rock wall overhung the path at one point.
sentences.cn: 部分岩壁悬在了小径一处的上方。

sentences.en: Select the largest bar diameter having the smallest possible overhang.
sentences.cn: 选择柄径最大、悬臂最小的镗刀.
那些峭壁悬在溪流之上.

sentences.en: The granite walls overhang and bend forward above to meet one another, almost forming an arch.
sentences.cn: 花岗岩的墙伸出在上面向前弯曲相互衔接, 几乎形成一道拱门.

sentences.en: The overhang from Mr. Huang's woes may be less easy to escape.
sentences.cn: 黄光裕的困境带来的威胁可能没那么容易摆脱.

sentences.en: The projecting overhang at the lower edge of a roof.
sentences.cn: 位于屋顶的最低的边缘的上方的突出部分.

sentences.en: The trees overhang the street to form an arch of branches.
sentences.cn: 树木突出于街道上面形成一道树枝的拱门.

sentences.en: There is a wide veranda under the overhang of the roof.
sentences.cn: 悬吊的屋顶下是一条宽阔的游廊。

sentences.en: These restored houses overhang a system of quiet canals.
sentences.cn: 这些修葺一新的房屋俯视着静静流淌的运河河网。

sentences.en: Use reference mark as described in 12 c to maintain correct overhang.
sentences.cn: 使用参考记号标记正确的超距.

sentences.en: Will the overhang of central bank gold drag the price down again?
sentences.cn: 那么央行所储备的大量黄金是否会将金价再次拉下来 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: （船首或船尾）突出部分；悬垂部分
悬于…之上；（危险、邪恶等）逼近

trans.tran_cn: 突出物，延伸量，伸出量，[航]突出船首（或船尾），（无法兑换黄金的）美元过剩额

trans.tran_en: to hang over something or stick out above it

trans.tran_cn: 伸突出，伸出，逼近，威胁，用悬挂物装饰
